== About me ==
Hello, I'm Andrea Carpineti and I'd love to be involved in Ubuntu!

I'm a proud Ubuntu user from several years and I used Linux also for dev some stuff.
I like the Ubuntu philosophy, the possibility to learn, to contribute and to be part of something bigger.
